# In the morning

___

## Getting up

- Turn off alarm
- Get out of bed

___

## Breakfast

- Eat eggs
- Drink coffee

---

# In the evening

___

## Dinner

- Eat spaghetti
- Drink wine

___

## Going to sleep

- Get in bed
- Count sheep
